# Import necessary libraries
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, current_timestamp
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
source_delta_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_ReferredToOtherService_vw'
target_delta_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_ReferralsToOtherServices'

# Read source view
src_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_delta_path)

# Create a DeltaTable object for the target table
target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_delta_path)

# Define merge and update conditions
merge_condition = """
    tgt.visitarchiveid = src.visitarchiveid AND
    tgt.Referred_To_Service_Order = src.ReferredToServiceOrder
"""

update_condition = """
    (tgt.Referred_To_Service_Code <> src.ReferredToServiceSNOMED OR
     (tgt.Referred_To_Service_Code IS NULL AND src.ReferredToServiceSNOMED IS NOT NULL) OR
     (tgt.Referred_To_Service_Code IS NOT NULL AND src.ReferredToServiceSNOMED IS NULL)) OR
    (tgt.Referred_To_Service_Desc <> src.ReferredToServiceDesc OR
     (tgt.Referred_To_Service_Desc IS NULL AND src.ReferredToServiceDesc IS NOT NULL) OR
     (tgt.Referred_To_Service_Desc IS NOT NULL AND src.ReferredToServiceDesc IS NULL)) OR
    (tgt.Activity_Service_Request_Date_Time <> src.ReferredToServiceDateAdded OR
     (tgt.Activity_Service_Request_Date_Time IS NULL AND src.ReferredToServiceDateAdded IS NOT NULL) OR
     (tgt.Activity_Service_Request_Date_Time IS NOT NULL AND src.ReferredToServiceDateAdded IS NULL))
"""

# Perform the MERGE operation
(target_table.alias("tgt")
 .merge(
    src_df.alias("src"),
    merge_condition
 )
 .whenMatchedUpdate(
    condition=update_condition,
    set={
        "Referred_To_Service_Code": "src.ReferredToServiceSNOMED",
        "Referred_To_Service_Desc": "src.ReferredToServiceDesc",
        "Activity_Service_Request_Date_Time": "src.ReferredToServiceDateAdded",
        "AmendOn": current_timestamp()
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedInsert(
    values={
        "visitarchiveid": "src.visitarchiveid",
        "Referred_To_Service_Order": "src.ReferredToServiceOrder",
        "Referred_To_Service_Code": "src.ReferredToServiceSNOMED",
        "Referred_To_Service_Desc": "src.ReferredToServiceDesc",
        "Referred_To_Service_Assess_Date_Time": "src.ReferredToServiceDateAdded"
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedBySource()
 .delete()
 .execute())

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = target_table.toDF().count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after merge: {affected_rows}")

# Import necessary libraries
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, current_timestamp
from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql.types import *

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
source_delta_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_ReferredToOtherService_vw'
target_delta_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_ReferralsToOtherServices'

# Read source view
src_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_delta_path)

# Create a DeltaTable object for the target table
target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_delta_path)

# Perform the MERGE operation
merge_stmt = target_table.merge(
    src_df.alias("src"),
    "tgt.visitarchiveid = src.visitarchiveid AND tgt.Referred_To_Service_Order = src.ReferredToServiceOrder"
)

# WHEN MATCHED clause
merge_stmt = merge_stmt.whenMatchedUpdate(
    condition = """
        (tgt.Referred_To_Service_Code <> src.ReferredToServiceSNOMED OR
         (tgt.Referred_To_Service_Code IS NULL AND src.ReferredToServiceSNOMED IS NOT NULL) OR
         (tgt.Referred_To_Service_Code IS NOT NULL AND src.ReferredToServiceSNOMED IS NULL)) OR
        (tgt.Referred_To_Service_Desc <> src.ReferredToServiceDesc OR
         (tgt.Referred_To_Service_Desc IS NULL AND src.ReferredToServiceDesc IS NOT NULL) OR
         (tgt.Referred_To_Service_Desc IS NOT NULL AND src.ReferredToServiceDesc IS NULL)) OR
        (tgt.Activity_Service_Request_Date_Time <> src.ReferredToServiceDateAdded OR
         (tgt.Activity_Service_Request_Date_Time IS NULL AND src.ReferredToServiceDateAdded IS NOT NULL) OR
         (tgt.Activity_Service_Request_Date_Time IS NOT NULL AND src.ReferredToServiceDateAdded IS NULL))
    """,
    set = {
        "Referred_To_Service_Code": "src.ReferredToServiceSNOMED",
        "Referred_To_Service_Desc": "src.ReferredToServiceDesc",
        "Activity_Service_Request_Date_Time": "src.ReferredToServiceDateAdded",
        "AmendOn": "current_timestamp()"
    }
)

# WHEN NOT MATCHED clause
merge_stmt = merge_stmt.whenNotMatchedInsert(
    values = {
        "visitarchiveid": "src.visitarchiveid",
        "Referred_To_Service_Order": "src.ReferredToServiceOrder",
        "Referred_To_Service_Code": "src.ReferredToServiceSNOMED",
        "Referred_To_Service_Desc": "src.ReferredToServiceDesc",
        "Referred_To_Service_Assess_Date_Time": "src.ReferredToServiceDateAdded"
    }
)

# Execute the MERGE
merge_stmt.execute()

# For the DELETE operation (rows in target not in source), we need a separate step
# First, we identify the rows to delete
rows_to_delete = target_table.toDF().alias("tgt").join(
    src_df.alias("src"),
    (col("tgt.visitarchiveid") == col("src.visitarchiveid")) &
    (col("tgt.Referred_To_Service_Order") == col("src.ReferredToServiceOrder")),
    "leftanti"
)

# Then we delete these rows
if rows_to_delete.count() > 0:
    target_table.delete(
        condition = """
        visitarchiveid IN (SELECT visitarchiveid FROM rows_to_delete) AND
        Referred_To_Service_Order IN (SELECT Referred_To_Service_Order FROM rows_to_delete)
        """
    )

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = target_table.toDF().count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after merge: {affected_rows}")
